intro: Astronidium confertiflorum, commonly known as the dense-flowered astronidium, is a member of the Rubiaceae family. It is a shrub or small tree native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its opposite, elliptical leaves that are usually glossy and dark green. Its flowers are small, clustered in dense inflorescences, and typically have four or five petals. The fruit is a small, woody capsule that contains several seeds.
